subject: Vuelta a Espana (Bicycle Race)
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Simon Clarke of Australia won the fourth stage of the Vuelta a España, and Joaquim Rodriguez, a Spaniard riding for Katusha, took the red leader’s jersey.
snippet: Simon Clarke of Australia won the fourth stage of the Vuelta a España, and Joaquim Rodriguez, a Spaniard riding for Katusha, took the red leader’s jersey.
